sentences: Ann Lewis (アン・ルイス, An Ruisu, born June 5, 1956 in Kobe, Hyōgo Prefecture, Japan) is a Japanese musician, popular in the 1970s and 1980s.
She released a few self-covers albums in the 2000s. She has been active as a creative director, consultant and designer.
Lewis was married to Japanese singer Masahiro Kuwana from 1980 to 1984.
They have a son together, Myuji, who was born in 1981.
